import react, {useState}from 'react' function HookComponent(props){ const [name,setName]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:''}); return(
setName({email:e.target.value})}/>
setName({password:e.target.value})}/>
setName({name:e.target.value})}/>
{name.name}
) } export default HookComponent
